entry.title: $2700 // Beautiful 2BR /Jacuzzi/ Balcony in a 2F house - next to Broadway
entry.content:
Large 2BR in a 2F house - 2ND Floor/ top!
Beautiful kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher,
granite counter and breakfast bar!
Nice living room open to the kitchen with AC - split system/very quiet!
Large balcony in front of the living area!
Two bedrooms with closets, in the master bedroom - AC - split system/very quiet!
Beautiful large bathroom with Jacuzzi bathtub and also cabin shower!
Brand new hard wood floors/ will be changed now!
Small pets are OK!
Very bright !
Next to Broadway Stop of N&W / at the moment use 36TH Ave Stop/
or Steinway Stop of R&M trains!
Next to all cafes, restaurants, bars and shopping -24/7 open on Broadway and 34TH Ave!
Very close to Kaufman Astoria Cinema Theater and Studio Square - the Beer Garden!

AVAILABLE SEPTEMBER 1ST!

Please, call/text @ 917-553-4168 or send an email for appointments!
